The Slidorion - A New jQuery Plugin

26 Oct 2011

The Slidorion is a great new jQuery plugin built to combine an image slider and an accordion. Accompanied by a range of features and effects, the Slidorion a fantastic and slick plugin. There are lot of image sliders out there, but nothing that provides the user with enough space to write a description about that image, whether it be a new product or a holiday home in Spain. The Slidorion gives you that freedom and also allows you to insert links into the description of that image.

Edit: There is now a Slidorion WordPress plugin available

View the Slidorion website to download the plugin
